frameset.edef: avenging , taking revenge for a perceived wrong

example.parse: (TOP (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قام) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN الطَبّاخ) (DET+ADJ الأَفْغانِي) (DET+ADJ المُتَحَمِّس)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الَّذِي)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يَعْمَل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-LOC (NOUN داخِل) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG قاعْدَة) (NP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL الأَمْرِيكِيِّين))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG العَسْكَرِيَّة)))))))) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هَذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN العَمَل))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ الجَرِيء)))) (S-ADV (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_INDEF_ACC إِنْتِقاماً) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP لِ) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG جَرِيمَة) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN إِحْراق) (NP (DET+NOUN المُصْحَف) (DET+ADJ الشَرِيف)))

arg.g: for the crime of burnng the Kuran
